sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
a part of another thing
ali
part of another thing
, je ena izmed sestavin, kosov ali prvin, ki tvorijo drugo stvar.

seg.quote: The head is the most sensitive part of the body.
I don't know this part of London very well.
The first part of that statement is a lie.
Economic measures must form part of any solution to this crisis.

sense.def:
V igri ali filmu je
a part
ena izmed oseb v zgodbi.

seg.quote: She plays the part of the witch.

sense.def:
One's part
je človekovo sodelovanje pri nečem, kar se zgodi.

seg.quote: He was arrested for his part in the demonstrations.

sense.def:
Kadar dve stvari, ki se dotikata,
part
ali
are parted
, se odmakneta druga od druge.

seg.quote: Ralph's lips parted in a delighted smile.

sense.def:
Kadar so lasje
parted
, so počesani v dve različni smeri, tako da vzdolž glave teče ravna črta.

seg.quote: A year ago they had parted for ever.
I parted from them on excellent terms.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
takes part in an activity
, je eden izmed ljudi, ki sodelujejo v njej.

seg.quote: I asked her if she'd take part in a discussion about the uprising.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
plays a large or important part in something
, je zelo dejaven pri tistem in pomembno pripomore k poteku dogodkov.

seg.quote: Men should play a bigger part in children's upbringing.
I consider this a gross oversight on your part.

sense.def:
Izraz
for the most part
ima enak pomen kot
mostly
.

seg.quote: The forest is, for the most part, dark and wet.

sense.def:
Izraz
in part
ima enak pomen kot
partly
.

seg.quote: The improvement was brought about in part by the Trade Union Movement.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
part and parcel of another thing
, poudarimo, da je del tega drugega ali vključeno vanj.

seg.quote: These things are part and parcel of my everyday life.

sense.def:
Kadar se je nekaj dogajalo
for the best part
ali
the better part of a period of time
, je potekalo večji del tistega časa.

seg.quote: The men stayed for the best part of a year.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
parts with something
, odda ali proda tisto, kar bi rad obdržal, nekomu drugemu.

seg.quote: She didn't want to part with the money.
